name: Summer Seduction VR
description:
This game is about walking around the island and collecting the flowers that you give to the girl.
if you find the right flower you will get a reward - SEX.


Summer is the most beautiful time of the year
and it is also the time
when we can experience unforgettable delightful moments ...

Welcome you player ...

Summer .., the sun is shining and it is really hot ...
it's time to visit this island and enjoy your vacation

many options waitngs for you:

you can stay on the beach...
you can also visit the nearby cottages to look for adventures,
you can go on a cruise to look for a hot girl
or climb to a volcano where a sexy goddess is waiting for you.

This is your SUMMER!!!

Features:

- Naked Girls
- Sex with girls
- Collecting flowers
- Beautiful island
